meanings.definition: In a manner related to or characteristic of hieratic script.
meanings.sent1: The scribe wrote hieratically on the ancient scroll.
meanings.sent2: The priestess copied the text hieratically onto the papyrus.
meanings.sent3: The cat attempted to walk hieratically across the keyboard, mimicking the scribe.
meanings.sent4: Her movements flowed hieratically, like the graceful strokes of a calligraphy brush.
meanings.sent5: The hieratically written symbols glowed softly in the dim candlelight.

meanings.definition: In a manner related to or characteristic of hieratic art.
meanings.sent1: The artist painted hieratically on the temple walls.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor carved the figures hieratically into the stone.
meanings.sent3: The child drew hieratically on the sidewalk with colorful chalk.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moved hieratically, capturing the essence of ancient rituals.
meanings.sent5: The hieratically adorned statues stood proudly in the courtyard.
